entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5 except plus 2 in a few localities. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5 except plus 2 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
